channel.title: Connecting to a Server
channel.description:
Please look at this topic, i had it going and some1 was helping me but he temporarily gave up on me lol...se please look and help me if u can (PLEASE BUMP IT) Link: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,487088.msg3570161.html#msg3570161]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,487088.msg3570161.html#msg3570161[/url]
[quote="Derosha22, post:1, topic:391140"]Ok is it just me or does windows 7 seem to suck? Lately whenever i try to run a client this error always pops
[code=actionscript]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run<Unknown Source> at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged<Native Method> at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<Unkown Source> at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass<Unkown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<Unkown Source> Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] the run setup for this is: [code=]@echo off title Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]
Then when i switched to this for run setup: [code=]@Echo off ECHO You may now close this window Cd bin "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\Javaw.exe" -Xmx254m -classpath .;Theme.jar Jframe 0 0 lowmem members 32 exit[/code] It loads client up to "Requesting title Screen" then it says "Connection error - Retrying in 60 seconds" (time stats at 5 seconds then repeats all over again but time always goes up" Also, this only happpens when i try to run it on my windows 7 laptop..when i run it on my Windows xp hosting comp (its my server) it works perfectly fine
Does anyone know how to fix this? Please help[/quote]

item.title: Connecting to a Server
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

I get this problem sometimes also. NO idea how to fix this, for some reason I’ve never seen anyone get help for this.

Read full topic

i got the same problem

item.title: Connecting to a Server
item.dc:creator: @Derosha22 Derosha22
item.description:
@Derosha22 wrote:

Please look at this topic, i had it going and some1 was helping me but he temporarily gave up on me lol…se please look and help me if u can (PLEASE BUMP IT) Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,487088.msg3570161.html#msg3570161

[quote=“Derosha22, post:1, topic:391140”]Ok is it just me or does windows 7 seem to suck? Lately whenever i try to run a client this error always pops

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run<Unknown Source> at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged<Native Method> at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<Unkown Source> at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass<Unkown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<Unkown Source> Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
the run setup for this is:

@echo off title Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

Then when i switched to this for run setup:

@Echo off ECHO You may now close this window Cd bin "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\Javaw.exe" -Xmx254m -classpath .;Theme.jar Jframe 0 0 lowmem members 32 exit
It loads client up to “Requesting title Screen” then it says “Connection error - Retrying in 60 seconds” (time stats at 5 seconds then repeats all over again but time always goes up"
Also, this only happpens when i try to run it on my windows 7 laptop…when i run it on my Windows xp hosting comp (its my server) it works perfectly fine

Does anyone know how to fix this? Please help[/quote]

Read full topic
